Red Alert - shopping priority list

This simple app allows you to set alerts for things you need to buy so you don\'t forget. The red alerts will show up as notifications in your phones\' bar and on the lock screen and will stay there until you remove the alert itself.

In future updates there will be some configuration options including the possibility to have notifications for the other alerts as well and the option to be able to dismiss the alerts.

Alert levels (colors)

Each alert has a level (color). The colors are used to order them - red - orange - yellow. For instance use a red alert for something you urgently need (you\'ve just ran out of toothpaste), an orange one for something you\'ll need in the near future (you\'ve just opened the last box of cereals) and a yellow alert for that spare light bulb you know you\'ll need someday.

Adding an alert

Simply click on one of the buttons which coresponds to the desired color and fill in the name of the item that you need and the name of the store that you find that item.
The app will autocomplete the item name based on the previous alerts you had.

Removing/editing an alert

You can simply swipe left an alert from the list to remove it.

Long click on one alert and it will open a context menu. Choose the desired action:
- Delete - removes the alert and the notification
- Make red/orange/yellow - change the alert level

Removing all alerts

Click on the button on lower right corner and choose OK when the dialog shows up.

Autocomplete

The app keeps a list of the previous alerts and it will autocomplete the item as you type. Once you decide to choose an item from the suggestions, it will autocomplete the store name based on some criteria. You can always ovewrite the store name with something else.
